quotes: Gro Harlem Brundtland (b. 1939)
She was born in Bærum, Norway, in 1939
Her father served in the Norwegian government in two roles, first as Minister of Social Affairs (1955-1961)
Her father served in the Norwegian government in two roles, first as Minister of Social Affairs (1955-1961) and then as Minister of Defence (1961-1965)
She served as head of the Norwegian Labour Party from 12 September 1979 to 25 October 1996
Brundtland received her medical degree from the University of Oslo in 1963

quotes: Her mother, Inga Margareta Elisabet Brynolf, born in Sweden, studied law and worked periodically for the parliamentary group of the Norwegian Labour Party
